00029 /********************************* Defines ************************************/
00030 
00031 #define         T_INT                                   0
00032 #define         T_STRING                                1
00033 
00034 #define         DB_OK                                   0
00035 #define         DB_ERR_GENERAL                  -1
00036 #define         DB_ERR_COL_NOT_FOUND    -2
00037 #define         DB_ERR_COL_DELETED              -3
00038 #define         DB_ERR_ROW_NOT_FOUND    -4
00039 #define         DB_ERR_ROW_DELETED              -5
00040 #define         DB_ERR_TABLE_NOT_FOUND  -6
00041 #define         DB_ERR_TABLE_DELETED    -7
00042 #define         DB_ERR_BAD_FORMAT               -8
00043 
00044 typedef struct dbTable_s {
00045         char_t  *name;
00046         int             nColumns;
00047         char_t  **columnNames;
00048         int             *columnTypes;
00049         int             nRows;
00050         int             **rows;
00051 } dbTable_t;

00068                                         char_t **returnValue);

00072                                         char_t *s);

00080  */

00084  *      Load the contents of a database to file
00085  */

00087
